text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my day off, I head to the shopping<n>district for some
shopping.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Why, if it isn't my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Might you be here to carry my bags?<n>Heh-heh, I'm
touched! Now work to<n>your heart's content.
choice_data_list: I came here to do some personal shopping...
I came here to do some personal shopping...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
No worries, I don't mind. You can get<n>that over with along
the way. As you<n>know, I am nothing if not<n>magnanimous!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In the end, I get roped into Agnes<n>Tachyon's shopping trip.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
A single tomato provides a<n>non-insignificant amount of
nutrition,<n>and yet this cumbersome body of<n>mine still
demands more.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
So I'll get a tomato... and three<n>steamed chicken breasts to
make a<n>salad. I can't neglect my protein<n>intake if I want to
see muscle growth.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Agh, what a hassle. If only I could<n>sustain myself solely on<n>
supplements.
choice_data_list: Supplements don't taste good, you know?
Supplements don't taste good, you know?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hey now, isn't eating just an act to<n>replenish our nutrients?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Most sources of nutrients can be<n>absorbed even if they're
ingested in<n>their base state. In some cases such<n>as
lycopene, ingesting processed<n>foods is more efficient.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
However, I have no time to waste on<n>cooking. Usually, I just
throw<n>everything I buy into a food processor<n>and call it a
day.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
If possible, I don't want to waste<n>even a second on oral
replenishment.<n>Time is finite, my dear Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The more I hear about Agnes<n>Tachyon's diet, the more
worried I<n>get.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Sigh... If the cafeteria wasalways open, I wouldn't have towaste my time shopping.
choice_data_list: Want me to cook for you?
Want me to cook for you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You, cook?! Haha! Should I call you<n>devoted or just
subservient?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I can't rule out the possibility that you<n>may have developed
an addiction to<n>serving me after all of our<n>experiments.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh, fine by me. It'll free up my<n>day. Not a bad idea at
all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It's decided—I'll leave dinner to you.<n>Attend to me with all
your being!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ah, and don't make anything too high<n>in calories. Make
sure to prepare<n>something nutritionally balanced.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And now I'm in charge of Agnes<n>Tachyon's meal prep.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What's the matter, calling me out at<n>this time?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, that's right! I was so absorbed<n>in my research that I
forgot to eat.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You see, I decided to go back to<n>basics. Like the pursuit of<n>
faster-than-light speed, unlocking the<n>potential of
Umamusume requires the<n>use of four-momentum—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
What are you so riled up about? In<n>any case, my research is
in a good<n>place. I won't need you for some<n>time, but you
can look forward to it all<n>the same.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I'll take that food off your hands, but I<n>must return to my lab
posthaste—my<n>research begs for a resolution.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next morning...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rattle...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Yawn... Good morning, Trainer.Here, my lunchbox.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Agnes Tachyon thrusts an empty<n>lunchbox into my hands.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Vitamins, minerals, proteins... Lipidsand carbohydrates, too. All present. Igive it an A for balance.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't unpalatable. But there are<n>two things you can
improve for next<n>time.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
First—I consumed the food during the<n>downtime between
experiments, but<n>having to use chopsticks proved to be<n>a
hassle. Fix that.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Second—there was far too little rice to<n>accompany the main
dish. Add some<n>more to balance things out.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I assume today's portion is a lost<n>cause, but I expect these
flaws to be<n>ironed out moving forward.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: My breakfast, of course. You do have<n>it, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: It's time for me to return to the lab.<n>Come on, hand it over.
choice_data_list: I don't have anything for you...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Wh-what?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You didn't make me breakfast?!<n>You're kidding me! You're
telling me I<n>left my research for this?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Didn't you promise to prepare my<n>meals?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Do I have to ask you for every meal?!<n>That would be way
too inefficient!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It's your job to look after me! So give<n>me something to eat,
pronto!
choice_data_list: I'll try to make something by lunchtime...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I said now! I want to eat now!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I can only suppress this craving with<n>nourishment—or
experimentation at<n>your expense.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Now, pick your poison. Either make<n>me food or fulfill your
role as my<n>guinea pig.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Fine by me. I'll move our experiment<n>to the afternoon, so
hurry up with that<n>breakfast, will you?
choice_data_list: You're still going to experiment on me?!
You're still going to experiment on me?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Naturally—it's your duty as my guinea<n>pig. Making me food
is your duty as<n>my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Going all the way to the cafeteria is<n>too much of a pain. I
think I'll go take<n>a nap, so wake me up when the food<n>is
ready.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I'm not asking for much. Feel<n>free to use the leftover
ingredients<n>from yesterday's meal. You still have<n>them, I
assume?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: All right, hop to it! Hurry up andmake me food!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad Tachyon has an interest in<n>food again, but does
she really expect<n>me to make her food every day?
